tags.name: simple-fields-array-item
tags.description:
`simple-fields-array-item`
an accessible expand collapse

### Styling

`<simple-fields-array-item>` provides the following custom properties
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--simple-fields-array-item-margin` | margin around simple-fields-array-item | 15px 0
`--simple-fields-array-item-border` | border around simple-fields-array-item | 1px solid
`--simple-fields-array-item-horizontal-padding` | horizontal padding inside simple-fields-array-item | 16px
`--simple-fields-array-item-horizontal-padding-left` | left padding inside simple-fields-array-item | `--simple-fields-array-item-horizontal-padding`
`--simple-fields-array-item-horizontal-padding-right` | right padding inside simple-fields-array-item | `--simple-fields-array-item-horizontal-padding`
`--simple-fields-array-item-vertical-padding` | vertical padding inside simple-fields-array-item | 16px
`--simple-fields-array-item-horizontal-padding-top` | top padding inside simple-fields-array-item | `--simple-fields-array-item-vertical-padding`
`--simple-fields-array-item-horizontal-padding-bottom` | bottom padding inside simple-fields-array-item | --simple-fields-array-item-vertical-padding
`--simple-fields-array-item-border-between` | border between simple-fields-array-item heading and content | --simple-fields-array-item-border
`--simple-fields-array-item-heading-font-weight` | font-weight for simple-fields-array-item heading | bold
`--simple-fields-array-item-heading-color` | text color for simple-fields-array-item heading | unset
`--simple-fields-array-item-heading-background-color` | background-color for simple-fields-array-item heading | unset

Events:

  * `reorder` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `added` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when constructed, so that parent radio group can listen for it.

  * `responsive-element` {`CustomEvent<{ element: this; attribute: string; relativeToParent: boolean; sm: number; md: number; lg: number; xl: number; }>`} - needs the size of parent container to add responsive styling

  * `copy` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `remove` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `removed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when detatched, so that parent radio group will no longer listen for it.

Attributes:

  * `preview` {`boolean`} - is disabled?

  * `__dragging` {`boolean`} - 

  * `__dropAccepts` - 

  * `__prev` - 

  * `__next` - 

  * `hide-reorder` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hide-duplicate` {`boolean`} - 

  * `draggable` {`string`} - is disabled?

  * `preview-by` {`any[]`} - fields to preview by

  * `expanded` {`boolean`} - is disabled?

  * `responsive-size` {`string`} - 

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - is disabled?

  * `error` {`boolean`} - whether fieldset has fields with errors

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - whether the tabbed interface is hidden

  * `inline` {`boolean`} - Whether field and label should be inline

  * `readonly` {`boolean`} - whether the tabbed interface is hidden

  * `label` {`string`} - fieldset legend

  * `name` {`string`} - unique name

  * `description` {`string`} - optional description

  * `is-simple-field-type` {`boolean`} - a simple boolean so that we can easily select ALL
things derived from simple fields regardless of
their eventual tag name

tags.name: simple-fields-code
tags.description:
`simple-fields-code`
 HTML inputs (excluding submit, reset, button, and image)
 with label, description, error massage,
 and aria-invalid functionality if needed.

Events:

  * `value-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `error-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `editor-value` {`string`} - changes the value of the editor

  * `focused` {`boolean`} - Whether the field is hidden

  * `theme` {`string`} - theme of code-editor

  * `autofocus` {`boolean`} - Automatically focus on field when the page is loaded

  * `font-size` {`number`} - Font-size of editor

  * `language` {`string`} - language of code-editor

  * `mode` {`number`} - mode of code-editor

  * `description` {`string`} - Optional description of the field (or use slot="description")

  * `defaultErrorMessage` {`string`} - Optional validation error message to display

  * `defaultRequiredMessage` {`string`} - Optional required validation error message to display

  * `errorMessage` {`string`} - Validation error message to display

  * `field` - Field element

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the field (or use slot="label")

  * `minchecked` {`number`} - Minimum number of checked items in fieldset

  * `maxchecked` {`number`} - Minimum number of checked items in fieldset

  * `maxwords` {`number`} - Maximum number of words in textarea

  * `name` {`string`} - Name of the input form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair.

  * `numberMessage` {`string`} - error message when number of items selected is not between min and max

  * `pattern` {`string`} - regex pattern the value must match to be valid

  * `patternMessage` {`string`} - error message when field does not match pattern

  * `prefix` {`string`} - Optional prefix string (or use slot="prefix")

  * `readonly` {`boolean`} - Value is not editable

  * `required` {`boolean`} - Whether field is required

  * `requiredMessage` {`string`} - error message when field is required and has no value

  * `suffix` {`string`} - Optional suffix string (or use slot="suffix")

  * `type` {`string`} - Type of input form control

  * `value` - Current value of the form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair.

  * `__delayedFocus` {`boolean`} - delays focus even until field is attached

  * `is-simple-field-type` {`boolean`} - a simple boolean so that we can easily select ALL
things derived from simple fields regardless of
their eventual tag name

  * `counter` {`string`} - a counter text and textareas: "character", "word" or unset for none

  * `autovalidate` {`boolean`} - Automatically validate field

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether the form control is disabled

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - Whether the field is hidden

  * `error` {`boolean`} - Whether field has errors

  * `id` {`string`} - Unique id

  * `inline` {`boolean`} - Whether field and label should be inline

  * `validTypes` {`any[]`} - List of valid field types

tags.name: simple-fields-combo
tags.description:
`simple-fields-combo`
 input tags and validate an array of input
 can return as a string or object based on
 requirements of the implementing element

Events:

  * `combo-input-keyup` {`CustomEvent<Event>`} - 

  * `value-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `error-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `activeDescendant` {`string`} - id of active option

  * `align-right` {`boolean`} - whether listbox is aligned on the right edge

  * `justify` {`boolean`} - whether listbox is full-width

  * `hoveredOption` - 

  * `expanded` {`boolean`} - whether listbox is expanded

  * `filter` {`string`} - input text to filter listbox options

  * `filteredOptions` {`any[]`} - aray of filtered listbox options

  * `inputFocus` {`boolean`} - whether input has focus

 HTML inputs (excluding submit, reset, button, and image)

  * `placeholder` {`string`} - Content to be appear in the form control when the form control is empty

so that they can appear in a prescribed order,

tags.name: simple-fields-lite
tags.description:
`simple-fields-lite`
Uses JSON Schema of fields to display a series of fields

### Styling
`<simple-fields-lite>` provides following custom properties
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|--------
`--simple-fields-margin` | vertical margin around container | 16px
`--simple-fields-margin-small` | smaller vertical margin above field itself | 8px
`--simple-fields-border-radius` | default border-radius | 2px
`--simple-fields-color` | text color | black
`--simple-fields-background-color` | background color | transparent
`--simple-fields-error-color` | error text color | #b40000
`--simple-fields-accent-color` | accent text/underline color | #3f51b5
`--simple-fields-border-color` | border-/underline color | #999

#### Field text
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|--------
`--simple-fields-font-size` | font-size of field | 16px
`--simple-fields-font-family` | font-size of field | sans-serif
`--simple-fields-line-height` | line-height of field | 22px

#### Detail text
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|--------
`--simple-fields-detail-font-size` | font-size of field details | 12px
`--simple-fields-detail-font-family` | font-size of field details | sans-serif
`--simple-fields-detail-line-height` | line-height of field details | 22px

#### Disabled Fields
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|--------
`--simple-fields-disabled-color` | disabled text color | #999
`--simple-fields-disabled-opacity` | opacity for disabled field | 0.7

### JSON Schema Format
This element accepts JSON schema with additional features noted in the example below:
```
{
$schema: "http://json-schema.org/schema#",
title: "Store",
type: "object",
format: "tabs",                                 //default object behavior can be overridden by format
required: [ "name", "email" ],
  properties: {
    settings: {
      title: "Settings",
      description: "Configure the following.",
      type: "object",
      format: "tabs",
      properties: {
        "basic-input": {
          title: "Basic input page",
          description: "Basic contact settings",
          type: "object",
          properties: {
            branch: {
              title: "Branch",
              type: "string"
            },
              name: {
                title: "Name",
                type: "string"
              },
              address: {
                title: "Address",
                type: "string",
                minLength: 3
              },
              city: {
                title: "City",
                type: "string",
                minLength: 3
              },
              province: {
                title: "Province",
                type: "string",
                minLength: 2
              },
              country: {
                title: "Country",
                type: "string",
                minLength: 2
              },
              postalCode: {
                title: "Postal/Zip Code",
                type: "string",
                pattern:
                  "[a-zA-Z][0-9][a-zA-Z]\\s*[0-9][a-zA-Z][0-9]|[0-9]{5}(-[0-9]{4})?"
              },
              email: {
                title: "Email",
                type: "string",
                pattern:
                  "(?:^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\\.[A-Za-z]{2,4}$)|(?:^$)"
              },
              website: {
                title: "Website",
                type: "string",
                format: "uri"
              },
              establishedDate: {
                title: "Established Date",
                type: "string",
                format: "date"
              },
              closedDate: {
                title: "Closed Date",
                type: ["string", "null"],
                format: "date"
              }
            }
          },
          arrays: {
          title: "Basic arrays page",
          description: "Demonstrates arrays",
          type: "object",
          properties: {
            phoneNumbers: {
              title: "Phone numbers",
              description: "List phone numbers and type of number.",
              type: "array",
              items: {
                type: "object",
                previewBy: ["phoneNumber"],                               //simple-fields-array allows a preview field 
                                                                          //for progressive disclosure of array items
                properties: {
                  type: {
                    title: "Type",
                    type: "string"
                  },
                  phoneNumber: {
                    title: "Phone Number",
                    type: "string"
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Configuring schemaConversion Property
You can customise elements from JSON schema conversion by setting `schemaConversion` property.
```
type: {                                       //For properties in "this.schema", define elements based on a property's "type"
object: {                                   //Defines element used when property's "type" is an "object"
  format: {                                 //Optional: define elements for "object" properties by "format"
    "tabs": {                               //Defines element used for object properties when "format" is "tabs"
      element: "a11y-tabs"                  //Element to create, eg. "paper-input", "select", "simple-fields-array", etc.
      descriptionProperty: "description"    //Optional: element's property that sets its description, e.g. "description"
      descriptionSlot: "description"        //Optional: element's slot that contains its description, e.g. "description"
      errorProperty: "error"                //Optional: element's property that sets its error status, e.g. "error"
      errorChangedProperty: "error"         //Optional: event element fires when error status changes, e.g. "error-changed"
      errorMessageProperty: "errorMessage"  //Optional: element's property that sets its error message, e.g. "errorMessage"
      errorMessageSlot: "errorMessage"      //Optional: element's slot that contains its error message, e.g. "errorMessage"
      labelProperty: "label"                //Optional: element's property that sets its label, e.g. "label"
      labelSlot: "label"                    //Optional: element's slot that contains its label, e.g. "label"
      prefixSlot: "prefix"                  //Optional: element's slot that contains its prefix, e.g. "prefix"
      suffixSlot: "suffix"                  //Optional: element's slot that contains its suffix, e.g. "suffix"
      valueProperty: "value"                //Optional: element's property that gets its value, e.g. "value" or "checked"
      setValueProperty: "value"             //Optional: element's property that sets its value, e.g. "value" or "checked" (default is same as valueProperty)
      valueChangedProperty: "value-changed" //Optional: event element fires when value property changes, e.g. "value-changed" or "click"
      valueSlot: ""                         //Optional: element's slot that's used to set its value, e.g. ""
      description: ""                       //Optional: element that contains description, e.g. "p", "span", "paper-tooltip", etc.
      child: {                              //Optional: child elements to be appended
        element: "a11y-tab"                 //Optional: type of child element, eg. "paper-input", "select", "simple-fields-array", etc.
        attributes: {                       //Optional: sets child element's attributes based on this.schemaConversion
          disabled: true                    //Example: sets disabled to true  
        } 
        properties: {                       //Optional: sets child element's attributes based on this.schema properties
          icon: "iconName"                  //Example: sets child element's icon property to this.schema property's iconName 
        }, 
        slots: {                            //Optional: inserts schema properties in child element's slots
          label: "label",                   //Example: places schema property's label into child element's label slot
          "": "description"                 //Example: places schema property's description into child element's unnamed slot
        } 
      },
      attributes: {},
      properties: {},
      slots: {}
    }
  },
  defaultSettings: {                        //Default element used for object properties
    element: ""
    label: ""
    description: ""     
    attributes: {}       
    properties: {}       
    slots: {}           
  }
}
}
```

Attributes:

  * `error` - Error messages by field name,
eg. `{ contactinfo.email: "A valid email is required." }`

  * `elementizer` - Conversion from JSON Schema to HTML form elements.
_See [Configuring schemaConversion Property](configuring-the-schemaConversion-property) above._

  * `disableAutofocus` {`boolean`} - Disables autofocus on fields.

  * `lang` {`string`} - Language of the fields.

  * `resources` - resource link

  * `__formElements` - form elements by id and config data in schema

  * `__formElementsArray` {`any[]`} - list form elements in order and config data in schema

  * `schema` - Fields schema.
_See [Fields Schema Format](fields-schema-format) above._

  * `value` - value of fields

Properties:

  * `error` - Error messages by field name,
eg. `{ contactinfo.email: "A valid email is required." }`

  * `elementizer` - Conversion from JSON Schema to HTML form elements.
_See [Configuring schemaConversion Property](configuring-the-schemaConversion-property) above._

  * `__delayedFocus` {`boolean`} - delays focus even until field is attached

  * `formElements` - form elements by id

  * `formElementsArray` {`any[]`} - list of form elements in order

  * `schemaConversion` - gets JSON schema to form element conversion object

  * `valid` {`boolean`} - whether there are no errors

  * `disableAutofocus` {`boolean`} - Disables autofocus on fields.

  * `language` {`string`} - Language of the fields.

  * `resources` - resource link

  * `__formElements` - form elements by id and config data in schema

  * `__formElementsArray` {`any[]`} - list form elements in order and config data in schema

  * `schema` - Fields schema.
_See [Fields Schema Format](fields-schema-format) above._

  * `value` - value of fields

tags.description:
`simple-fields-tabs` takes in a JSON schema of type array and builds a form,
exposing a `value` property that represents an array described by the schema.

Events:

  * `a11y-tabs-active-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `responsive-element` {`CustomEvent<{ attribute: string; custom: string; element: this; sm: number; md: number; lg: number; xl: number; }>`} - 

  * `responsive-element-deleted` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `aria-label` {`string`} - 

  * `active-tab` {`string`} - id of active tab

  * `icon-breakpoint` {`number`} - Optional minimum breakpoint for showing tab text with icons, or
Default is always text with icons.
`-1` forces icon-only mode.

  * `id` {`string`} - unique identifier/anchor for tabbed interface

  * `layout-breakpoint` {`number`} - Optional minimum breakpoint for horizontal layout of tabs.
Default is unset (always horizontal).
`-1` forces vertical-only mode.

  * `sticky` {`boolean`} - whether tabs are sticky

  * `__tabButtons` {`any[]`} - an array of tab buttons

  * `full-width` {`boolean`} - if tabs should be full width or not

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - whether tabbed interface is disabled

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - whether tabbed interface is hidden

  * `__tabs` {`any[]`} - an array of tab data based on slotted `a11y-tab` elements

  * `__tabFocus` {`number`} - which tab button has ketboard focus

  * `responsive-width` {`number`} - width in pixels

  * `responsive-size` {`string`} - size of tabs,
where `xs` is smaller breakpoint
and `xs` is larger breakpoint

  * `sm` {`number`} - Miniumum value for small breakpoint

  * `md` {`number`} - Miniumum value for medium breakpoint

  * `lg` {`number`} - Miniumum value for large breakpoint

  * `xl` {`number`} - Miniumum value for extra-large breakpoint

  * `disable-responsive` {`boolean`} - 

Properties:

Default is always text with icons.

tags.name: simple-fields-code
tags.description:
`simple-fields-tag-list`
 input tags and validate an array of input
 can return as a string or object based on
 requirements of the implementing element

Events:

  * `value-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `simple-fields-tag-list-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `error-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `single-value-only` {`boolean`} - 

  * `tag-list` {`any[]`} - 

  * `accept` {`string`} - Hint for expected file type in file upload controls

  * `block-options` {`boolean`} - if element is a a list of radio or checkbox options,
will to display each item as a block instead of inline

  * `capture` {`string`} - Media capture input method in file upload controls

  * `dirname` {`string`} - Name of form field to use for sending the element's directionality in form submission

  * `list` {`string`} - Value of the id attribute of the `<datalist>` of autocomplete options

  * `max` {`number`} - Maximum value for numeric field types

  * `maxlength` {`number`} - Maximum length (number of characters) of `value`

  * `min` {`number`} - Minimum value for numeric field types

  * `minlength` {`number`} - Minimum length (number of characters) of `value`

  * `placeholder` {`string`} - Content to be appear in the form control when the form control is empty

  * `size` {`number`} - Size of the control

  * `step` {`number`} - Incremental values that are valid

  * `autocomplete` {`string`} - Hint for form autofill feature

  * `autofocus` {`boolean`} - Automatically focus on field when the page is loaded

  * `multiple` {`boolean`} - Whether to allow multiple values

  * `spellcheck` {`string`} - Whether input subject to spell checking by browser/OS as "true", "default", or "false"

  * `items-list` {`any[]`} - array of options [{value: "key", text: "Text"}] for select, radio options, and checkboxes,
so that they can appear in a prescribed order,
eg. [{value: "b", text: "Option B"}, {value: "a", text: "Option A"}, {value: "c", text: "Option C"}]

  * `options` - options {value: "Text"}  for select, radio options, and checkboxes,
which are sorted by key,
eg. {a: "Option A", b: "Option B", c: "Option C"}

  * `hovered` {`boolean`} - hover state pegged to attribute

  * `wrap` {`boolean`} - text wrapping for textarea,
"hard": automatically inserts line breaks (CR+LF)
"soft": all line breaks as CR+LF pair
"off" : no wrapping / <textarea> becomes horizontally scrollable

  * `description` {`string`} - Optional description of the field (or use slot="description")

  * `defaultErrorMessage` {`string`} - Optional validation error message to display

  * `defaultRequiredMessage` {`string`} - Optional required validation error message to display

  * `errorMessage` {`string`} - Validation error message to display

  * `field` - Field element

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the field (or use slot="label")

  * `minchecked` {`number`} - Minimum number of checked items in fieldset

  * `maxchecked` {`number`} - Minimum number of checked items in fieldset

  * `maxwords` {`number`} - Maximum number of words in textarea

  * `name` {`string`} - Name of the input form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair.

  * `numberMessage` {`string`} - error message when number of items selected is not between min and max

  * `pattern` {`string`} - regex pattern the value must match to be valid

  * `patternMessage` {`string`} - error message when field does not match pattern

  * `prefix` {`string`} - Optional prefix string (or use slot="prefix")

  * `readonly` {`boolean`} - Value is not editable

  * `required` {`boolean`} - Whether field is required

  * `requiredMessage` {`string`} - error message when field is required and has no value

  * `suffix` {`string`} - Optional suffix string (or use slot="suffix")

  * `type` {`string`} - Type of input form control

tags.name: simple-fields-url-combo-item
tags.description:
`simple-fields-url-combo-item`
`displays a selectable list of resources as a grid or combobox`

Attributes:

  * `name` {`string`} - human readable name, label, text, or title of resource

  * `icon` {`string`} - optional: preferred icon for resource

  * `preview` {`string`} - optional: preferred url for thumbnail image preview of resource

  * `type` {`string`} - optional: preferred resource file type

  * `value` {`string`} - url, src, id, filename or other unique value for resource

Properties:

  * `iconTypes` {`{ anchor: string; page: string; pdf: string; doc: string; docx: string; ppt: string; pptx: string; csv: string; xls: string; xlsx: string; url: string; file: string; mp4: string; mov: string; webm: string; mp3: string; wav: string; html: string; tel: string; email: string; }`} - default list of icons by file extension

  * `currentLocation` - default site location

  * `resourceURL` - URL object from value string

  * `isLocal` {`boolean`} - whether or not value is local to current site

  * `isSamePage` {`boolean`} - whether or not value on same as current location

  * `isAnchor` {`boolean`} - whether or not value is an anchor on current page

  * `fileExtension` {`string`} - value's file extension

  * `imageTypes` {`string`} - file extensions of images that can be previewed on the web

  * `pageTypes` {`string`} - file extensions of web pages

  * `isPage` {`boolean`} - whether value is a web page

  * `isEmail` {`boolean`} - whether value is an email address

  * `isPhone` {`boolean`} - whether value is a phone number

  * `isImage` {`boolean`} - whether value is an image

  * `previewSrc` {`string`} - gets url for preview thumbnail

  * `iconName` {`string`} - icon name for item based

  * `iconTemplate` - icon template of item

  * `imageTemplate` - preview image template of item

  * `previewTemplate` - preview template, based on preview or icon by default;
if none is provided, template based on previewSrc or iconName

  * `labelTemplate` - label template for item

  * `primaryLabelTemplate` - primary label template with item name or value

  * `secondaryLabelTemplate` - secondary label template with item value

  * `name` {`string`} - human readable name, label, text, or title of resource

  * `icon` {`string`} - optional: preferred icon for resource

  * `preview` {`string`} - optional: preferred url for thumbnail image preview of resource

  * `type` {`string`} - optional: preferred resource file type

  * `value` {`string`} - url, src, id, filename or other unique value for resource

  * `noOptions` {`boolean`} - gets whether or not the field has options

  * `sortedOptions` - gets a sorted list of option

  * `selectTemplate` - template for `select` in shadow DOM

  * `textareaTemplate` - template for `textarea` in shadow DOM

  * `autocomplete` {`string`} - Hint for form autofill feature

  * `autofocus` {`boolean`} - Automatically focus on field when the page is loaded

  * `multiple` {`boolean`} - Whether to allow multiple values

  * `spellcheck` {`string`} - Whether input subject to spell checking by browser/OS as "true", "default", or "false"

  * `itemsList` {`any[]`} - array of options [{value: "key", text: "Text"}] for select, radio options, and checkboxes,
so that they can appear in a prescribed order,
eg. [{value: "b", text: "Option B"}, {value: "a", text: "Option A"}, {value: "c", text: "Option C"}]

  * `options` - options {value: "Text"}  for select, radio options, and checkboxes,
which are sorted by key,
eg. {a: "Option A", b: "Option B", c: "Option C"}

  * `hovered` {`boolean`} - hover state pegged to attribute

  * `wrap` {`boolean`} - text wrapping for textarea,
"hard": automatically inserts line breaks (CR+LF)
"soft": all line breaks as CR+LF pair
"off" : no wrapping / <textarea> becomes horizontally scrollable

  * `description` {`string`} - Optional description of the field (or use slot="description")

  * `defaultErrorMessage` {`string`} - Optional validation error message to display

  * `defaultRequiredMessage` {`string`} - Optional required validation error message to display

  * `errorMessage` {`string`} - Validation error message to display

  * `field` - Field element

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the field (or use slot="label")

  * `minchecked` {`number`} - Minimum number of checked items in fieldset

  * `maxchecked` {`number`} - Minimum number of checked items in fieldset

  * `maxwords` {`number`} - Maximum number of words in textarea

  * `name` {`string`} - Name of the input form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair.

  * `numberMessage` {`string`} - error message when number of items selected is not between min and max

  * `pattern` {`string`} - regex pattern the value must match to be valid

  * `patternMessage` {`string`} - error message when field does not match pattern

  * `prefix` {`string`} - Optional prefix string (or use slot="prefix")

  * `readonly` {`boolean`} - Value is not editable

  * `required` {`boolean`} - Whether field is required

  * `requiredMessage` {`string`} - error message when field is required and has no value

  * `suffix` {`string`} - Optional suffix string (or use slot="suffix")

  * `type` {`string`} - Type of input form control

  * `value` - Current value of the form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair.

  * `__delayedFocus` {`boolean`} - delays focus even until field is attached

  * `descriptionTemplate` - template for slotted or shadow DOM description

  * `errorTemplate` - template for slotted or shadow DOM error message

  * `fieldBottom` - gets bottom (metadata, description, and error message) of a field

  * `fieldId` {`string`} - gets field's id

  * `fieldMainTemplate` - template label and field

  * `fieldMeta` - gets field metadata

  * `hasFieldset` {`boolean`} - 

  * `labelTemplate` - template for slotted or shadow DOM label

  * `multicheck` {`boolean`} - 

  * `numberError` {`number | false`} - determines if number of items selected
is not between min and max

  * `numeric` {`boolean`} - determines if field is numeric

  * `patternError` - determines if value does not match regex pattern

  * `prefixTemplate` - template for slotted or shadow DOM prefix

  * `requiredError` - determines if field is required and blank

  * `slottedFieldObserver` {`void`} - overridden mutation observer

  * `suffixTemplate` - template for slotted or shadow DOM suffix

  * `isSimpleFieldType` {`boolean`} - a simple boolean so that we can easily select ALL
things derived from simple fields regardless of
their eventual tag name

  * `counter` {`string`} - a counter text and textareas: "character", "word" or unset for none

tags.name: simple-fields
tags.description:
`simple-fields`
Uses JSON Schema to display a series of fields

### Styling
`<simple-fields>` provides following custom properties
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|--------
`--simple-fields-margin` | vertical margin around container | 16px
`--simple-fields-margin-small` | smaller vertical margin above field itself | 8px
`--simple-fields-border-radus` | default border-radius | 2px
`--simple-fields-color` | text color | black
`--simple-fields-error-color` | error text color | #b40000
`--simple-fields-accent-color` | accent text/underline color | #3f51b5
`--simple-fields-border-color` | border-/underline color | #999
`--simple-fields-border-color-light` | used for range tracks | #ccc
`--simple-fields-faded-error-color` | used for range tracks | #ffc0c0

#### Field text
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|--------
`--simple-fields-font-size` | font-size of field | 16px
`--simple-fields-font-family` | font-size of field | sans-serif
`--simple-fields-line-height` | line-height of field | 22px

#### Detail text
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|--------
`--simple-fields-detail-font-size` | font-size of field details | 12px
`--simple-fields-detail-font-family` | font-size of field details | sans-serif
`--simple-fields-detail-line-height` | line-height of field details | 22px

#### Disabled Fields
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|--------
`--simple-fields-disabled-color` | disabled text color | #999
`--simple-fields-disabled-opacity` | opacity for disabled field | 0.7

#### Radio Buttons and Checkboxes
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|--------
`--simple-fields-radio-option-display` | display label with field (flex) or above (block) | flex
`--simple-fields-radio-option-flex-wrap` | allow radio options to wrap to next line | wrap

### Configuring schemaConversion Property
You can customise elements from JSON schema conversion by setting `schemaConversion` property.
```
type: {                                       //For properties in "this.schema", define elements based on a property's "type"
object: {                                   //Defines element used when property's "type" is an "object"
  format: {                                 //Optional: define elements for "object" properties by "format"
    "tabs": {                               //Defines element used for object properties when "format" is "tabs"
      element: "a11y-tabs"                  //Element to create, eg. "paper-input", "select", "simple-fields-array", etc.
      descriptionProperty: "description"    //Optional: element's property that sets its description, e.g. "description"
      descriptionSlot: "description"        //Optional: element's slot that contains its description, e.g. "description"
      errorProperty: "error"                //Optional: element's property that sets its error status, e.g. "error"
      errorChangedProperty: "error"         //Optional: event element fires when error status changes, e.g. "error-changed"
      errorMessageProperty: "errorMessage"  //Optional: element's property that sets its error message, e.g. "errorMessage"
      errorMessageSlot: "errorMessage"      //Optional: element's slot that contains its error message, e.g. "errorMessage"
      labelProperty: "label"                //Optional: element's property that sets its label, e.g. "label"
      labelSlot: "label"                    //Optional: element's slot that contains its label, e.g. "label"
      valueProperty: "value"                //Optional: element's property that gets its value, e.g. "value" or "checked"
      setValueProperty: "value"             //Optional: element's property that sets its value, e.g. "value" or "checked" (default is same as valueProperty)
      valueChangedProperty: "value-changed" //Optional: event element fires when value property changes, e.g. "value-changed" or "click"
      valueSlot: ""                         //Optional: element's slot that's used to set its value, e.g. ""
      description: ""                       //Optional: element that contains description, e.g. "p", "span", "paper-tooltip", etc.
      child: {                              //Optional: child elements to be appended
        element: "a11y-tab"                 //Optional: type of child element, eg. "paper-input", "select", "simple-fields-array", etc.
        attributes: {                       //Optional: sets child element's attributes based on this.schemaConversion
          disabled: true                    //Example: sets disabled to true  
        } 
        properties: {                       //Optional: sets child element's attributes based on this.schema properties
          icon: "iconName"                  //Example: sets child element's icon property to this.schema property's iconName 
        }, 
        slots: {                            //Optional: inserts schema properties in child element's slots
          label: "label",                   //Example: places schema property's label into child element's label slot
          "": "description"                 //Example: places schema property's description into child element's unnamed slot
        } 
      },
      attributes: {},
      properties: {},
      slots: {}
    }
  },
  defaultSettings: {                        //Default element used for object properties
    element: ""
    label: ""
    description: ""     
    attributes: {}       
    properties: {}       
    slots: {}           
  }
}
}
``` 
### Configuring fieldsConversion Property
You can customise fields to JSON schema conversion by setting `fieldsConversion` property.
```
defaultSettings: {            //default JSON schema type if no type is matched
type: "string"              //sets JSON schema type to string
},
inputMethod: {                //for fields in "this.fields", define elements based on a property's "inputMethod"
colorpicker: {              //settings if inputMethod is color picker
  defaultSettings: {        //default colorpicker settings
    type: "string",         //sets JSON schema type to string
    format: "color"         //sets JSON schema format to color
  }
}
}
```

Events:

  * `active-tabs-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `fields-ready` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `value-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `fields-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

  * `schema-changed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `fields` {`any[]`} - Fields to convert to JSON Schema.

  * `schematizer` - Conversion from fields array with inputMethods to JSON schema types and formats.
_See [Configuring fieldsConversion Property](configuring-the-fieldsconversion-property) above._

  * `label` {`string`} - Schema label

  * `active-path` - tracks all activeTabs as an object

  * `code-theme` {`string`} - default theme for code editor

  * `disable-responsive` {`boolean`} - 

  * `error` - Error messages by field name,
eg. `{ contactinfo.email: "A valid email is required." }`
